name: What a Night!
description:
Text-based choose your own adventure type of game where the player's goal is to figure out what he/she/them did last night. Contains swear words and dubious English. Sorry about that.

Choose your adventure using either key 1 or 2 on your keyboard.

This is my first try at developing and publishing a text-based game. Please consider it only as a draft.  Feedback is more than welcome.

Text / visual / development by Karolina Komarkova

Track by Red_Haired_Giants
